comment: I am not sure what these kids are complaining about.  Her tests are directly from her reviews.  She teaches from the textbook. Gives extra points for possible bad teaching curve. Go to class and do your studies, and trust me, you will have no problem passing her class. She will not babysit you!

Dr. McCarthy is not an easy  teacher but is very fair to her students. She takes the time to help you understand the material. The material taught is HARD, extra time is def spent doing extra readings. Great prof!!!!
Bad, bad, bad....Doesn't know how to teach!
Yeah...uuuummmmm...no! Very unclear!
She is very unclear and unhelpful. Do not take her!

Dr.  McCarthy is one of the worst Psych professors at KSU. I took her for Experimental Psych and she has no clue what she is doing with the statistics part of it. Just save yourself the trouble and not take her.

Maybe I shouldn't have taken her for the Maymester? I felt like she was teaching Graduate level not undergrad.She didn't use the text book so it was hard to follow her. But she used her power points a lot. Write your notes in her Power points.A very hard B I got. Wouldn't take her again tho' I enjoyed her great sense of humor...LOL!

Took McCarthy for Maymester. It was an extremely rigorous course, but she paced it really well and was very understanding, considering the short span of the class. Her tests were tricky, but fair. She has a weird sense of humor, but I liked her. Read the book and take really good notes, and you'll be okay.
I felt that she was very fair and extremely helpful.  She makes every effort to help students succeed on the course. She made the maymester a lot less stressful than it normally is.

I took her for an Experimental Hybrid class. Doing the labs online was not bad, but our class time was spent catching up on our outside assignments. She tries to be clear and organized, but it's still hard to understand what she expects. She also really wasn't willing to help us.Good news is, she's not a stickler for APA and she's pretty sarcastic.

Great teacher. had her for maymester. the tests were had, but that was where the grades came from and she let us argue qts. she was willing to explain further after class if something was unclear. and yes like the others said she was sarcastic, but then laughing is never a bad thing. :) must read material and go over the material several times.

I took her maymester class and have no complaints with her teaching. She was very thorough and let us know exactly what we'd be tested on. With that being said, definitely READ the book. Test material was directly from the text. McCarthy is extremely sarcastic and has very dry humor, which I thought was great. Also lets  you argue test questions.

I really enjoyed this professor. She is very intelligent with a very good sense of humor. I took the Maymester Class and the only thing I regret is that I did not have her for an entire 16 week semester. We had to move very rapidly to get through the material. a harder class than I expected.  The tests multiple choice and tough.

DO NOT TAKE HER!!! All she does is lecture the whole class. It is boring. She gives random pop quizzes so attendance is mandatory if you want a good grade. You must take notes and study for the tests if you want to pass. Her tests are IMPOSSIBLE! good luck if you take her.

Must read the book.  Do questions at the end of the books and online book questions.  Four MC test, 6 class quizs, and research assignment (easy).  Must study and class attendence recommended.  Hard but fair.

Awesome Prof. Shes strict, pretty funny/sarcastic and very Intelligent. Has no patience for those who dont take class seriously. 4 exams, no papers, 6 pop-quizzes so i recommend attending class. She gives a verbal review of what is covered on the test the class before. I will be taking her again.

GREAT PROFESSOR! The class is not easy, but she is helpful and available to her students.  She is great with responding to e-mails.  If you work hard and ask her any questions you may have, you will do great. Enjoy!

I am taking her now for experimental psychology which is spring semester 2009. The class is hard, but she is such a cool professor, she makes the class interesting and she is very helpful. She does not use powerpoints, but she does tell students what they need to focus on as far as exams which is the textbook. Overall, she is a great teacher!

If you want to gain a confidence in your thinking ability - take her! Extremely smart and strangely funny, but she will keep you on your toes! You will have to study hard, but this is college, not high school, so get over it and start studying!

great teacher. Study guides were a help but dont limit your time to that only. study the book and also the questions in the sections too. i had her for a may-mester, she was great and worked with us on the tight schedule and fixed tests to give you an extra 6pts.

She's a fascinating woman-knows a lot..however, she often goes off on tangents that I had no desire to listen to. She's full of interesting information that is useless on the tests, which she is very unclear about.You must read the book to succeed. If you're in for an easy A, this is not the route for you.

McCarthy is a good professor. She teaches all on powerpoints and her info. is straightforward. Problem is....ITS TONS OF INFORMATION. When it comes to test time, a lot of her notes are on the test, but the questions are really confusing. Overall, she is a good professor and if you need help, she is right there when you need her

This professor is amazing! I really enjoyed her class. She covers the material in an interesting, entertaining way. She asks questions and gets discussions started. You do have to study to do well on her tests.

She gives way too much information in the powerpoints and expects us to read the book too  She is also very unclear on what will appear on the test.  She says that she will not put any thing on the test that is not in the powerpoints, but she does it anyway.  She maintais a cool vibe in the classroom but makes the tests harder than they need to be.

I loved this class. the information we learned was so interesting and she really helps make the class fun. I took a summer 4 week session. We had 3 tests...that's all...no quizzes no papers. Her tests come straight from the power point and lectures. She was very helpful with answering any questions. I would deffiently recommend her!

I absolutely loved this class. She is really helpful, and she makes you feel comfortable about speaking out. I usually don't even like to talk in class, but she makes it known that everyone's opinions should be heard. The workload is average, there are some papers. But she's a pretty laid-back grader.

Dr. McCarthy is an awesome teacher!  She always takes the time to explain things if you don't understand them.  Also, she is very open to other peoples opinions.  I was never afraid to share my thoughts in her class.  As far as workload, there are a lot of papers to write, but their all short essays and you learn a lot from them.

Her teaching style is very good. Instead of just presenting you facts, she asks you questions so that you work to get the information.  She has a very dry sense of humor which asserts itself when things get too serious. I enjoy her class because if you work hard you will do well. However, if you don't put the effort in, YOUR GRADE WILL SUFFER!
She is really interesting. She is really strong about her views but she is respectful of others feelings. Also, her dry sense of humor is quite funny!
